forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 66F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 66F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early then becoming windy with rain developing later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
